titles: A copie of a challenge, taken owt [sic] of the confutation of M. Iuells sermon made by Iohn Rastell
author: Rastell, John, 1532-1577.

Rastell, John, 1532-1577. Confutation of a sermon, pronounced by M. Juell, at Paules crosse, the second Sondaie before Easter (which Catholikes doe call Passion Sondaie) Anno Domini .M.D.LX. Selections.
notes: Reprints leaves 160-176 of STC 20726:  A confutation of a sermon, pronounced by M. Juell, at Paules crosse, the second Sondaie before Easter (which Catholikes doe call Passion Sondaie) Anno Domini .M.D.LX.
Running title reads: A challenge agaynst the Protestantes.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Jewel, John, 1522-1571. --  True copies of the letters betwene the reverend father in God John Bisshop of Sarum and D. Cole --  Controversial literature.
Catholic Church. --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
